Package org.springframework.jdbc.core

Interface ParameterDisposer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArgumentPreparedStatementSetter, ArgumentTypePreparedStatementSetter
public interface ParameterDisposer
Interface to be implemented by objects that can close resources allocated by parameters like SqlLobValue objects.

Typically implemented by PreparedStatementCreators and PreparedStatementSetters that support DisposableSqlTypeValue objects (e.g. SqlLobValue) as parameters.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Thomas Risberg, Juergen Hoeller
See Also:
  • PreparedStatementCreator
  • PreparedStatementSetter
  • DisposableSqlTypeValue
  • SqlLobValue

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cleanupParameters()
    Close the resources allocated by parameters that the implementing object holds, for example in case of a DisposableSqlTypeValue (like an SqlLobValue).

      Close the resources allocated by parameters that the implementing object holds, for example in case of a DisposableSqlTypeValue (like an SqlLobValue).
